Shade.name: Dark Hunger
changes: Dark Hunger is now an activated ability that causes Shade to drain Health from enemies around him, with the total drain amount increasing with each subsequent hit on an identical enemy.

Shade.name: Stalk
changes: Stalk now applies a 3.5s debuff, on attack, that slows by 30/40/50/60% and deals 20/30/40/50 Physical damage per second in 0.5s intervals.
Damage type changed to Physical (was Pure).

Shade.name: Venomous
changes: Venomous now deals damage over time based on the amount of debuffs the affected target has.

Shard Magus.name: Glacial Impact
changes: Heroes under 10/11/12% Health that are hit by Glacial Impact are shattered, killing them. Applies after damage is inflicted.

Shard Magus.name: Icicle Barrage
changes: Increased number of icicles to 10/20/30/40 from 8/16/24/32.

ITEM.name: Crystal Focus
changes: Now grants a flat 10s cooldown reduction on the activating ability rather than refreshing it.
